Education About Me

Allstar Cheerleader

When I'm not stuck behind the screen. I'm flying and tumbling at my cheer team in leuven or in the Belgian National Cheerleading Team.

After a short (6y) gymnastics carreer, I tried out for Aira United Diamond in 2014. A beginning cheer team in Leuven that at that time had just been founded 2years before. Since then we have participated in (and won) multiple European Championships and participated 3 times at the World Championships in the USA.

Team Belgium

This year I have been selected to be part of Team Belgium Cheer.

Together with this team, I will be representing Belgium in April of 2023 at the ESPN Wide World of Sports in Orlando, Florida.

From the 13th of April until the 23rd we will be undertaking the journey to the USA and participate in the semi-finals on the 20th and hopefully strive for gold at the finals the day after.

For that reason I will not be available for business offers during this period.
